department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch:
This course provides a comprehensive, thorough, and up-to-date treatment of engineering mathematics. It is intended to introduce students of engineering, physics, mathematics, computer science, and related fields to those areas of applied mathematics that are most relevant for solving practical problems.

A. Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) in Chapters 1–6
C. Fourier Analysis. Partial Differential Equations (PDEs). See Chapters 11 and 12
D. Complex Analysis in Chapters 13–18
